game.title: The quest of the lost treasure
game.description: You will have to find the lost treasure in the old castle.

task.description: You will have to find the old castle and enter it.
Search every corner of the old castle for any clues.
You will find a riddle that leads to the treasure's hiding place.
Use the answer from the riddle to access a secret room.
task.location: A hidden door in the castle walls

task.description: The lost treasure will be inside the secret room, secure it.
